data.fullContent: The artist knew that the painting would be special from the very beginning. The work was inspired by a song he had heard while sitting on a beach one day. He remembered the feeling he had when he first heard the song that day, and he began to paint the scene on his canvas. When he was finished, he realized that his work was completely original. He hadn't seen anything like it before. It was unlike any other painting. Its colors were vibrant and it had a feeling of energy. When the painting was finally complete, he didn't know what it was worth, so he decided to put it up for sale at auction. Several people wanted to buy it, but it was a young college student who bid the highest price. So the artist sold the painting to the student and wished him luck.

q1.translation: 画家从一开始就知道这幅画会很特别。他的创作灵感来自一天坐在海滩上听到的一首歌。他记起那天第一次听到这首歌时的感觉，便开始在画布上画出这一场景。
q1.front: The artist knew that the painting would be special from the very beginning. The work was inspired by a song he had heard while sitting on a beach one day. He remembered the feeling he had when he first heard the song that day, and he began to paint the scene on his canvas.
q1.content: The artist knew that the painting would ____ special from the very beginning. The work was ____ by a song he had heard while sitting on a beach one day. He remembered the ____ he had when he first heard the song that day, and ____ began to ____ the scene on his canvas.

q2.translation: 画家从一开始就知道这幅画会很特别。他的创作灵感来自一天坐在海滩上听到的一首歌。他记起那天第一次听到这首歌时的感觉，便开始在画布上画出这一场景。当他完成时，他意识到他的工作是完全原创的。他以前从未见过这样的东西。这幅画不同于其他任何一幅画。它的颜色很鲜艳，给人一种充满活力的感觉。当这幅画最终完成时，他不知道它值多少钱，所以他决定把它拿去拍卖。有几个人想买它，但一个年轻的大学生出了最高价。于是画家把这幅画卖给了学生，并祝他好运。
q2.front: The artist knew that the painting would be special from the very beginning. The work was inspired by a song he had heard while sitting on a beach one day. He remembered the feeling he had when he first heard the song that day, and he began to paint the scene on his canvas.
q2.middle: When he was finished, he realized that his work was completely original.
q2.ending: He hadn't seen anything like it before. It was unlike any other painting. Its colors were vibrant and it had a feeling of energy. When the painting was finally complete, he didn't know what it was worth, so he decided to put it up for sale at auction. Several people wanted to buy it, but it was a young college student who bid the highest price. So the artist sold the painting to the student and wished him luck.

He reached a point where he couldn't create anymore without being inspired.
